companyName: Collier & Associates Law Offices - Plantation, FL
description:
Collier & Associates Law Offices is a personal injury firm in Plantation, Florida. The attorneys at the law office bring decades of experience to personal injury cases in South Florida. Its commitment is evident in the fact that the office generally only represents victims, not big corporations that are trying to get out of paying compensation.

Personal Injury Practice Areas

Personal injury is a vast field that spans several industries, such as medicine and transportation. These are some of the types of cases the law office handles in this area:

• Auto accidents
• Cruise ship accidents
• Medical malpractice
• Slip-and-fall accidents
• Workers' compensation
• Nursing home abuse

Why Choose Collier & Associates Law Offices

Because the firm exclusively represents victims, there is little to no conflict of interest. This helps the firm live up to its promise of prioritizing integrity and honesty. It also puts clients at ease to know that the attorneys do not handle cases for insurance companies and other corporations they may need to go up against.

To add to the years of expertise and commitment to clients, the law office also provides prompt and courteous service. Many clients prefer this level of personalized service. They feel reassured that their voices are heard by the attorneys and will be heard in a court of law or by the insurance company.
